text:
I don’t believe it’s possible to link to the in-app screen with the filters you want.

That said, you could list the tickets in a CMS page, or an external app which you use the APIs to fetch that data.

Neat idea though.

>  a CMS page
I'm pretty new to HubSpot; this is <https://www.HubSpot.com/products/cms|CMS Hub>? I've never looked at it; is it intended to be used to craft internal dashboards with e.g. a custom view of tickets, and authorized only for HubSpot agent users?

Intended for it no, but any data in the CRM you can use when building on CMS Hub. So you could create say a ticket portal for either reps or customers to use. Itd need to be behind cms memberships.

Alternatively you could build a crm card that lists the tickets (without cms hub). That would however be displayed on an object records page. Which may not be where you want it.
